content.rendered:
Directed by Sachin Ravi. Sachin

Written by Chandrajith. Hussain Haidry. Ganesh Hegde. K.N. Vijay Kumar. Abhijit Mahesh. Sachin Ravi. Rakshit Shetty. Sanjay Upadhyay

Cast Rakshit Shetty (Inspector Narayana). Shanvi Srivastava (Lakshmi). Achyuth Kumar (Constable Achyuthanna). Balaji Manohar (Jayarama). Pramod Shetty (Thukarama). Madhusudhan Rao (Ramarama). Gopalkrishna Deshpande (Bandmaster). Anirudh Mahesh (Shanku (as Aniruddh Mahesh)). Salman Ahmed (Drama Company Artist #1). Chandan Achar (Drama Company Artist #2). Raghu Pandeshwar (Harishchandra , Drama Company Artist #3). Prakash Thuminad (Drama Company Artist #4). Kiran Nayak (Drama Company Artist #5). Sri Harsha Mayya (Bhalla , Drama Company Artist #6). Shashank (Dharma , Drama Company Artist #7). M.K. Mata (Gadipaar). Vijay Chendur (Sudhakar). Gautham Raj (Vibhasu). Ashwin Hassan (Narsi). Rakesh Raj (Cowboys #1). Srikanth Nagraj (Cowboys #2). Vishwanath (Cowboys #3). Rupesh (Cowboys #4). Abhijit Mahesh (Cobar). Ajith (Narsi’s Teammate #1). Mallesh (Narsi’s Teammate #2). Girish (Narsi’s Teammate #3). Krishna (Narsi’s Teammate #4). Sundar (Narsi’s Teammate #5). Anand Kattappa (Bhaira). Daabar (Bhaira’s Teammate #1). Chandru (Bhaira’s Teammate #2). Anand (Bhaira’s Teammate #3). Chandan (Dhanu). Vinay Krishnaswamy (Raavana). Jayalakshmi Malnad (Thukaram’s Mother). Meese Murthy (Jaambavantha). Pranava Murthy (Blind Man). Channappa Nayak (Demon #1). Mohammad (Demon #2). Parashuram (Chess Player). Raaghu Raamanakoppa (Harish Chandra). Ugram Ramesh (Bhadra). Ravi (Ugra). Muniraj (Goon #1). Surya Praveen (Goon #2). Yuvendra (Goon #3). Srinath (Goon #4). Pavan (Goon #5). Jagadish (Goon #6). Jamish (Goon #7). Arun (Goon #8). Murali (Vaanara #1). Rishab Shetty (Cowboy Krishna in a cameo appearance). Yograj Bhat (Guptananda Swamiji in a cameo appearance). Prakash Shenoy (Drama Master) .Ashok.Mallikarjun Devaramane.Ganesh.Lokesh Gowda. Kantharaj. Lakshmikanth. Mallikarjun. Murthy. Narayana. Raghavendra Ponnappa. Krishna Prasad. Roopesh. Santhosh. Srikanth. Srinivas. Venky

Languages Kannada

Producers Pushkara Mallikarjunaiah. H.K. Prakash. Rakshit Shetty

Production Paramvah Studio. Pushkar Film. Sri Devi Entertainer
